DESCRIPTION: Formats a string in U.S. format. (For other currencies, use LSCurrencyFormat or LSEuroCurrencyFormat.
EXAMPLE: <!--- This example shows the use of DollarFormat ---> ... <h3>DollarFormat Example</h3> <cfloop from = 8 to = 50 index = counter> <cfset full = counter> <cfset quarter = counter + (1/4)> <cfset half = counter + (1/2)> <cfset threefourth = counter + (3/4)> <cfoutput> <pre> bill #DollarFormat(full)# #DollarFormat(quarter)# #DollarFormat(half)# #DollarFormat(threefourth)# 18% tip #DollarFormat(full * (18/100))# #DollarFormat(quarter * (18/100))# #DollarFormat(half * (18/100))# #DollarFormat(threefourth * (18/100))# </pre> </cfoutput> </cfloop> ...
